comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945 is a guess, as IBM appears to obscure the actual core Eclipse build.  Clearly a 3.2.2.x though.

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Install PDT RC3 via links method to match Eclipse version 3.2.x

2. Install WST 1.5.5 based on error messages from PDT

3. On each keystroke PDT attempts to validate and gives modal dialog, see below

See bug 198573.  The underlying problem seems to be with WST.  Is there a possibility that turning off per keystroke validation would work around this issue?

More information:
Here's the specific error generated by PDT's call to WST on validation of keystroke:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-08-01 14:20:22.840
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Processing Dirty Regions".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.ProjectFacetsManager (initialization failure)
	at java.lang.J9VMInternals.initialize(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ValidationRegistryReader.getProjectFacetIds(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ValidationRegistryReader.calculateVmdsForNatureAndFacets(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ValidationRegistryReader.getValidatorMetaData(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ValidationRegistryReader.getValidatorMetaData(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ValidationRegistryReader.isConfiguredOnProject(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ProjectConfiguration.extractProjectValidators(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ProjectConfiguration.<init>(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ConfigurationManager.getProjectConfiguration(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.validator.ValidatorStrategy.getProjectConfiguration(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.validator.ValidatorStrategy.isValidatorEnabled(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.validator.ValidatorStrategy.reconcile(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.DocumentRegionProcessor.process(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.StructuredRegionProcessor.process(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.DirtyRegionProcessor.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Unknown Source)

You should move to our new version as we are not going to solve specific bugs in our previous incubations releases.

Our last stable release is:
http://download.eclipse.org/tools/pdt/downloads/?release=S20070611-M1
close, please as been mentioned by Roi, use latest stable build
